We are Homo Sapiens (Stringer, Chris, 2016) and we can extend a little bit more the knowledge about our specie family looking for the first common possible ancestor with Homo neanderthalensis (Stringer, Chris, 2016). This looks like a big simplification, but it is an objective way to show that we are all the same specie.

The animal evolution needs a lot of time to happen, but sometimes there are explosions (Sperling, Erik A., et Richard G. Stockey, 2018, pp. 605-622), on the other hand, the language evolution (Fitch, W.T., 2017, 3-33) is quick and as direct consequence we can easily define and spread group of people, this also has the side effect that people are different.

value.name: People defamed as Jews
value.desc: were people that did not have Jewish ancestors in near generations, but still people said they were Jews. The word defamation has a relationship with Inquisition times, and it should not be treated in the same way nowadays.
